com.genband.kandy.api

Interface IKandyGlobalSettings


  • public interface IKandyGlobalSettings
    Represent the class with Full Kandy and SPiDR Configuration like as: Kandy USer Info, Kandy API Configuration, Kandy SDK Configuration and SPiDR Configuration

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods
